title: Looking for some quick norms buddies
body: Doing a few norms add me quick IGN: Loony Russian

replies.body:
Hi, I don't know if you're still looking, but we have some people on the Momentum Gaming discord server that are looking for more I think.
Link: https://discord.gg/qgejJWM

Just hop in and ask around, most of us are friendly! You're welcome whenever you want to find people to play with.
